reference.title: lib/configuration.properties file
reference.shortdesc: The lib/configuration.properties file controls certain common properties, as well as some properties that control PDF processing.

table.title: Properties set in the lib/configuration.properties file

row.entry: Specifies the default language. The allowed values are those that are defined in IETF BCP 47, Tags for the Identification of Languages.

Generates the @xtrf and @xtrc debugging attributes. The following values are allowed:
true (default) — Enables generation of debugging attributes in the temporary files.
false —Disables generation of debugging attributes. Disabling debugging attributes reduces the size of temporary files and thus reduces memory consumption. However, the log messages no longer have the source information available and thus the ability to debug problems might deteriorate.

Specifies the error-recovery mode. The following values are allowed:
strict — enforce strict input validation
skip — lax input validation with no error recovery
lax (default) — lax input validation and error recovery

FrameMaker index syntax processing. The following values are allowed:
true— FrameMaker index syntax processing
false (default) — normal DITA 1.2 index syntax processing

I18N font processing. The following values are allowed:
true (default) — I18N processing is enabled
false — I18N processing is disabled

Legacy temporary file mode for generating topic.fo and graphics into output directory. The following values are allowed:
true — Use output directory for XSL-FO processing
false (default) — Use temporary folder for XSL-FO processing
